attributes.action: Challenge the Legal, Democratic and Moral basis of the EU Referendum outcome
attributes.additional_details: Therefore the Referendum outcome has no legal or moral basis, it has no democratic mandate or validity and it should be challenged and refuted by the Houses of Parliament and the Law Lords.
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, challenge the legal, democratic and moral basis of the Referendum outcome. 

The core promise of a saving of ‘£350M for the NHS’ was denied by N.Farage and other leaders, after the Referendum vote. 

Many people voted on the basis of this falsehood.

rejection.details:
If you want Britain's exit from the EU to be delayed until there has been a public inquiry into the referendum campaign, you could sign this:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/137183
